incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays From and To All Networks In France Over A Subset Of Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the  issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

We are experiencing SMS Delivery Delays From and To All Networks In France Over A Subset Of Shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Account Sign Ups for Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Account Sign Ups and was degraded for 15 minutes between 1:37 and 1:52pm Pacific Time on 02/15/2023.  During this period, customers may have experienced issues with Sign Up. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Issue with Outbound Call Signing for US based traffic

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting outbound calls to Twilio in the US has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We have started to see recovery in PSTN Call Signing within the US. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio is experience connectivity issues with our identity resolution vendor affecting approximately 5% of voice calls which require signing capability.  Affected customers will see a notification indicating a signing error. We are currently working with the carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing issues with a subset of outbound calls from the US. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: A2P 10DLC Campaign Vetting Delays

incident_updates.body: We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 7 days until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
